metadata.name: The old soul of Johnny "the gunfighter"
metadata.description:
The old soul of Johnny "the gunfighter", souls in color series

TOM HOFF
worked in 2022

2048*2732pixel, 300DPI
PNG

The colors we see tell us our own interpretation of reality. No one sees colors the same way you see them. The light, your way of interpreting them and your mood help you to make a construction of what you are and want to see. These souls are interpretations of fictional characters that wander through lights in this world.
